nodes.text: Teyr was a bureaucratic and tourism planet located in the Surric system of the Colonies.
Teyr was a bureaucratic world, 34 light-years from Vulvarch. It was located near the juncture of three busy spaceways, including the Shipwrights' Trace.

It was a popular tourist destination, known for its majestic mountains and the breathtaking Teyr Rift. Thousands of cruise ships, yachts, and other tourist vessels arrived daily at overcrowded orbital facilities from which passengers were ferried down to the planet. The Rift Skyrail connected all Teyr's spaceports with all major population centers and resort destinations in the Rift Territory.
The Mobquet Presents: Fastest Land Beings race was held on Teyr.
The planet was colonized by at least 496 BBY.
Just before the Clone Wars, the Mobquet Presents: Fastest Land Beings race was held in the major city of Pyre Folas on Teyr. It was sponsored by landspeeder manufacturer Mobquet Swoops and Speeders.
During the Clone Wars, it was the site of the Battle of Teyr in 22 BBY, which was led by the Jedi Master K'Kruhk.

By 16 ABY, Teyr was one of the New Republic's boom worlds. Fearing unbridled growth, Teyr's leaders created the Citizen Services Corps and tried to discourage immigrants with a maze of regulations. During the Black Fleet Crisis, Jedi Master Luke Skywalker and his companion Akanah traveled to the planet seeking traces of the Fallanassi.
Ganner Rhysode, a member of the New Jedi Order, was from Teyr.
